createInitiDg

static org.eclipse.emf.ecore.sdo.EDataGraph createInitiDg()
Creates an initial data graph which can be used as an empty skeleton. This can be filled with data according to the query.

This skeleton includes a DocumentRoot, and a SmProject object. The name of the project is set to the name set in the origRoot object.

Parameters:
projectName - The original root object of the data graph that includes all data from the repository. This will be used to query the project name and possibly other values that need to be copied every time a new data graph has to be created.
Returns:
The newly created data graph.
